MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DD6 area of Newport-on-Tay, affecting properties in Tayfield House and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1pm due to repairs required to our overhead electricity network near South Lodge and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12pm on Friday, 29 January 2021
